column2: Attempt to manipulate Hysh to heal the people from injuries and illness.
Use white wind of magic to anish the demon from the body of a person.
Summon a blizzard to slow march of your enemies.
Raises an ice wall from the ground.
Unleash a icestorm and biting winds upon enemies.
Attempt to cast dark magic spells.
Attempt to manipulate Aqushy the red wind of magic.
Performs a ritual of great power raising undead legion.
Summons the Wind of Death - which sucks the life from the the living in area.
Requires enormous magical power and hundreds of human corpses.
Requires trendemous magical power. Will kill large amount of population - cannot be used in the same province twice.
Join the holy war against Chaos forces that are traspassing your lands.
Requires Chaos army trasspasing your lands.
Call for help against forces of Chaos
Sends a call for help to every ruler of forces of order.
